title: Installing mesa+hwrender fails
body:
I discovered this while trying to depend on it within the VTK package.  But it is reproduced, using a recent `develop` (12/07/17), by just trying to install it directly (i.e. `spack -d install mesa+hwrender).

### Expected Result

I expected the installation to complete successfully.

### Actual Result

The installation seemed to fail during the `configure` stage:

I am attaching that build log in case it's helpful, though it seems the important bit was captured above.

[spack-build.out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/1540846/spack-build.out.txt)

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack -d install mesa+hwrender
```

### System Information

This happened on Ubuntu 16.04, with no custom packages or modules yaml files.  Please let me know if more system information is needed.
